tags: None
review: The most helpful advice and positive doctor, also his medication is top notch, even suggests lots of exercises to help the pain

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Have been visiting Dr Ajay for quite some time due to various different issues we got(unfortunately ), for my small toe fracture, back issue, my wife's wrist pain due to pregnancy and her shoulder issue which happened during gym. Dr Ajay is very nice in explainig thing. He doesn't rush and explain things clearly with references like xrays and googled images and body structure. He also performed my Wife's wrist surgery in his clinic, for  which she is recovering fine. Just expect little delay sometimes with ur appointment time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i underwent spinal surgery at a well known hospital 3 years back,but my symptoms persisted even after surgery i tried to bear it for couple of years went to Kerala, Ayurveda and homeo none of them worked then i started visiting lots of spine surgeons but none of gave me the solution i went to dr ajay he ran some tests and diagnosed me as failed back so he suggested surgery again i waited for 3 months before i made my mind for surgery now it is 4 months of surgery im completely normal thanks to dr ajay .
reply_text: Thanks very much for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Ajay, 
u r a   very great personality.....Today 8-11-2018, with cool,ease and compassion successfully did spine fusion surgery on my wife mrs p Vijaya Gayatri. 
Your post operative care is superb and none to match. U r core of the  hard-core professional with lot of perservence, and have high concerns  on people trusting you.

I pray Al mighty, to bestow U with God speed and sterling success in all your endeavours in relieving the  pains of patients approaching  you.....

Wish u and your family members good luck, wealth and prosperity.
reply_text:
Thank you very much for your valuable feedback 
And trust.
I wish all the best and speedy recovery 
Thanks
Regards
Dr Ajay Kumar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited Dr.Ajay for l5 s1 disc problem. He clearly explained the problem, solution and suggested to go for surgery. Initially i was very worried, but the support i received from the doctor and my family members helped me move forward. Post surgery i am feeling very relaxed as my pain has completely vanished. 
Dr.Ajay is a very cool person and he treats the problem very efficiently. He is very clear and open. With my personal experience I highly recommend this doctor for all orthopedic and spine related problems.Thank you so much for the wonderful treatment :)
reply_text: thank you very much for your honest opinion

tags: None
review:
I have been to serval doctors regarding knee problem in reputed hospitals but doctors don't have time to talk  they talked as if they r doing a favour to me.

But accidentally I went to Dr Ajay first think I liked in him was his talk and lisent to u and his suggestion regarding  the problem . First visit gave me happiness and satisfaction . Later i got operated my both the legs total knee replacement by him and i am happy now . before and after surgery he took lot of care . Even today i call him if i have any health issues for his suggestions

tags: None
review: Extremely down to earth...Explains things in a layman language rather than technical jargon... It's been just 1 day and the results are impressive... **** ****** **** *** ********* Experience shows off with the fact that before even seeing the outcome of the MRI scan he almost diagnosed the problem ************Talks straight to the point nothing unnecessary and listens you very carefully...He will answer all your doubts however foolish they may be... Apart from the doctors even the hospital is also very well organized and the staff is also very helpful...I will share all views after the completion of the whole treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Visited the doctor for knee pains and ankle problem. 
He explained in detail including  the earlier taken MRI  and even the earlier doctor did not explain. He explained the actual problem and we are extremely  happy to know the correct position. 
Thanks to the friendly approach of the doctor and proper diagnosis and correct treatment.
I will recommend whole heartedly to the needy patients.

tags: None

review: I visited the doctor for chronic foot / heal pain with a history of plantar fascitis. Doctor quickly identified numbness in some part of the foot region and advised for nerve conduction testing.Post confirmation in testing, I was advised to take medicine for one month. The pain got cured after two or three weeks and I am pain free now.Many thanks to Ajay Kumar for resolving my chronic foot pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

The First name we get is Dr. Ajay's when it comes to any Ortho problem in our family and extended family. Excellent doctor for all ortho issues, particularly for spine and pain related issues. Every time we treated with Dr. Ajay. We are 100% satisfied with the treatment. Despite he move away from our home to Kukatpally but we still prefer his treatment to others.

Sami

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had accident and i lifted the bike with my right hand so complete weight came on the same these all things i explained to doctor 
He dignosed and said 
No investigation are required just u take one week treatment as i have taken 
and again i visited to the clinic he recommended physiotherapy for one week with one month additional supplements which was pregabalin , L methyl folate , ocycarbazipne etc but till the effect of medicine i had relief from pain as i sttoped the medicine it's became like early intolerable pain 
Don't go to that doctor
reply_text:
Ok thank you all the best 
Now after 17 years of orthopaedic practice teach me how to treat patients 
Did I say to stop the medicine 
Did I suggest any surgeries
Did I write 100 investigations 
When I didn’t say any of these you have no right to comment on me or my skills

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Ajay kumar is very sweet person..Explained very clear about the issue...We are happy with the doctor and treatment. Except the token system it’s really horrible experience.. we had a prior appointment  irrespective of which we were made to wait more than 45 min ...People who just came after us were allowed inside but we made to wait, out of my curiosity I asked the staff when can I expect my turn, they were confident and replied based on token system then I said mine will 4 or 5 present token running is 8 then staff had no ans.. we came from a long distance no value for time.. its not at all acceptable

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Do not go to this doctor....
First time when I visited him for my mom's lower back pain issue he asked to get x-ray but till the time we got reports he went for a surgery ** ******* ********** ******* ** **** ************ **** *** *** ***** *** **** ******* ******* *** **** ******** *** ***** *** ** ** ******* **** **** **** ** ** *** ***** *** when we visited him he started scaring my mom that it's a big problem but he will do 1small surgery where he will injection cement and restore bone high and said it will cost 1lakh and no need for hospitalization but if you want to claim insurance then he will admit for 1day also. And then I felt suspicious and consulted another doctor ** ****** *** **** **** *** * *** ***** *** ********* ** **** **** ** **** ** ******** *** **** ***** ******** *** *** ** *** ** *********** Then I received few calls from kims also which I didn't answer which I think is for getting operation done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My wife had met with a minor accident. As a precaution I got X-ray done and I was told there were no issues by another doctor at another hospital. She kept getting worse until we visited Dr.Ajay. He took one look at the X Ray, explained the symptoms my wife was facing ( to our pleasant surprise) and pointed out the underlying issues on the X-ray report. He also has a great physiotherapist at his disposal, who oversees dressing and other critical activities, in a professional manner. ******* ** *** ** **** ********* *** set the right expectations. Glad we picked him out.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited Dr.Ajay for the back pain I am having for a long time now. Looking at my ailment, he suggested an MRI and a few blood tests. Based on the reports, he also explained me the exact problem  I had and ensured that this can be cured simply using some medication and a few exercises he will show me next week. 
I am confident that soon I shall be cured of my ailment and pain based on me following the advice from Dr. Ajay 
To add, he is a calm and composed person with a lot of patience and integrity

tags: None
review:
I have visited dr Ajay for knee following slip from the bike, before I have visited him went to an Ortho locally and I was told that nothing went wrong but, my pain was not relieved so, through practo ratings I seendr ajay. 
Dr Ajay examined me and explained me in detail that I had a ligament tear and needs to be confirmed by MRI I went through the test which showed ACL tear 
I was completely satisfied with his approach and planning to get surgery done next week
I would highly recommend him for any person with orthopaedic problems.

review: Excellent doctor. I met with an accident a year ago on left leg below knee. It keep swelling after a year. I feel suspect some bone damage inside the injury like that.., i went to this doctor and he just took 2-3 minutes to found the problem. He gave medicine tablets for 30 days. My leg swelling is cleared from day 2 on wards after using medicines. Thanks a lot to the doctor.  I just want to update this review towards gratitude to the doctor.
reply_text: thank you very much for your valuable feedback and belief in me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was friendly. Explained us the problem and the suggested treatment. Problem is that the most of the medicine prescribed is available only in the clinic but not anywhere outside. This is very problematic to us. Also, it would be great if the readability of the prescription can be increased by writing the medicine names clearly. This might take a minute more but is readable by everyone and can avoid confusions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I met doctor couple of weeks ago due severe back pain. Initially, he suggested me X-Ray followed by one week medication. In first two days itself, I felt relax and some what pain was released. In the second week, he recommended me for physiotherapy and daily small work outs. Now Iam feeling better, 100% my back pain issue has been resolved. Thanks to doctor AJAY and his staff!

review: Bad experience. booked appointment at 06.30 but they called at 8.00 pm and cancelled the appointment
reply_text:
thanks for your feedback
i was supposed to reach clinic by 6:30 pm but, my spine surgery which was supposed to finish by 5:30 pm at global went up to 7:30 pm and i started at 7:30 from lakdikapul to reach kphb but unfortunately on that day the traffic was so severe that i could not reach hospital as i was held up in severe traffic jam that is the reason we cancelled all appointments these sort of things happens once in  while our motto is never to keep u waiting and we kept informing all the patients 
we make sure that you are informed properly
thanks
regards
dr ajay
